category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > Sub-1 GHz Transceivers
name: mikroe.click.ismrx3
short_description: ISM RX 3 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a Sub-GHz RF receiver. This board features the MAX41470, a high-performance, low-power receiver ideal for amplitude shift-keyed (ASK) and frequency shift-keyed (FSK) data from Maxim Integrated, now part of Analog Devices.
